alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Kershaw (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 26 at 2:14PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Fairfield and west central Kershaw Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 214 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Winnsboro, moving northeast at 30 mph. ...Boaters on Lake Wateree Should Seek Safe Harbor... HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake Wateree State Park, Liberty Hill, Longtown and Lake Wateree near Highway 97. This includes Interstate 77 between mile markers 36 and 41. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
